Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40660 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.23.0-4
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-40660 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.23.0-4. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package opensc is earlier than 0.23.0-4, affected by CVE-2023-40660
